span.span: Provides a command adapter class for the XHTML adapter set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的控制項配接器命名空間提供 XHTML 轉譯和處理上各種不同顯示裝置的行動控制項。The control adapters in the namespace provide XHTML rendering and processing for mobile controls on a variety of display devices.
